parameters.name: ApiName
parameters.description: The name of the API operation. You can create only a cluster API operation template. Set the value to CreateCluster.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content of the cluster API operation template. Set the value to JSON strings of the request parameters of the [CreateCluster](~~454393~~) API operation for creating a cluster.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: Template ID (it is recommended to use the parameter TemplateId).
